sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { removeToCart } from './cartSlice' const AddToCartPage = ({item}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() return ( <>
{item.title}
{item.description}
₹{((item.price) * 81).toLocaleString()}.00
⭐{item.rating}
dispatch(removeToCart(item))}>remove from cart
buy this
save for review
) } export default AddToCartPage
